### PR summary [a3ac150d49](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/14309/commits/a3ac150d495a4806edc986899c610c44e3c138dd)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
| `Mathlib.RepresentationTheory.FdRep`|-1458|
| `Mathlib.RepresentationTheory.FDRep`|1458|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ FdRep`
`+ instance (V : FDRep k G) : AddCommGroup V := by`
`+ instance (V : FDRep k G) : FiniteDimensional k V := by`
`+ instance (V : FDRep k G) : Module k V := by`
`+ instance (V W : FDRep k G) : FiniteDimensional k (V ⟶ W)`
`+ instance : CoeSort (FDRep k G) (Type u)`
`+ instance : ConcreteCategory (FDRep k G) := inferInstance`
`+ instance : HasFiniteLimits (FDRep k G) := inferInstance`
`+ instance : HasForget₂ (FDRep k G) (Rep k G)`
`+ instance : HasKernels (FDRep k G) := by infer_instance`
`+ instance : LargeCategory (FDRep k G) := inferInstance`
`+ instance : Linear k (FDRep k G) := by infer_instance`
`+ instance : Preadditive (FDRep k G) := inferInstance`
`+ instance : RightRigidCategory (FDRep k G) := by`
`+ invariantsEquivFDRepHom`
`- instance (V : FdRep k G) : AddCommGroup V := by`
`- instance (V : FdRep k G) : FiniteDimensional k V := by`
`- instance (V : FdRep k G) : Module k V := by`
`- instance (V W : FdRep k G) : FiniteDimensional k (V ⟶ W)`
`- instance : CoeSort (FdRep k G) (Type u)`
`- instance : ConcreteCategory (FdRep k G) := inferInstance`
`- instance : HasFiniteLimits (FdRep k G) := inferInstance`
`- instance : HasForget₂ (FdRep k G) (Rep k G)`
`- instance : HasKernels (FdRep k G) := by infer_instance`
`- instance : LargeCategory (FdRep k G) := inferInstance`
`- instance : Linear k (FdRep k G) := by infer_instance`
`- instance : Preadditive (FdRep k G) := inferInstance`
`- instance : RightRigidCategory (FdRep k G) := by`
`- invariantsEquivFdRepHom`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh short <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh <optional_commit>
```
</details>

</details>

After the declaration of `FDRep`, you should add the line `@[deprecated (since := "2024-07-05")] alias FdRep := FDRep`, so that users who were using the previous name understand what happens when they update.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:

  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9897392830/job/27341777521)

source.title: feat(RepresentationTheory/FdRep): FdRep is a full subcategory of Rep
